name: Knot Topology vs Particle Lifetime (Gamma)
description: Correlation test between topological invariants (Crossing/Unknotting number/Signature) and decay width Gamma.

hypothesis.H0: There is no significant correlation between knot invariants and particle decay widths.
hypothesis.H1: Particle decay widths (Gamma) are significantly correlated with topological invariants (p < 0.05).

data_requirements.description: PDG decay width data and KnotInfo invariants.

test_method: Spearman rank correlation and log-linear regression analysis between topological invariants and decay widths.
